alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cleveland and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Toledo, or over Rison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Star City... Rison... Kingsland... Nebo... Feenyville... Mt Elba... Cane Creek State Park... Toledo... Garrett Bridge... Glendale in Lincoln County... Calhoun... Cornerville... Tyro... Rowell... Palmyra... Rose Hill... Crigler... Fresno... Calmer... Garnett... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas.
